dublinCore.dc:title: 100 S1774 PCS: Undetectable Firearms Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Nelson (for himself and Mr. Schumer) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 1 year.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Undetectable Firearms Reauthorization Act of 2013.
Section 2(f)(2) of the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 (Public Law 100â€“649; 18 U.S.C. 922 note) is amended in the matter preceding subparagraph (A) by striking 25 and inserting 26.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
